feature.label: Brief Text Editor Emulator for Eclipse
feature.description: Adds key bindings and functionality that attempts to emulate many features of the original BRIEF MS-DOS application. BRIEF (Basic Re-configurable Interactive Editing Facility) was a powerful and popular programmer's text editor in the late 1980s and early 1990s, developed by UnderWare Inc.
